title: The Favorites - NFL Week 15 Gambling Preview
itunes:title: The Favorites - NFL Week 15 Gambling Preview
description:
Now that professional NFL bettor Simon Hunter has gotten himself onto this podcast's logo, many listeners believe his co-host, Action Network Chief Content Officer Chad Millman, must show him more deference when it comes to picking games. Luckily, Simon has strong opinions about this week's NFL slate, so the two build a robust early lineup of spread bets even as injury and COVID uncertainly looms large.

We get a Foxhole Bet of the Week, along with a Simon Says pick, plus full coverage of every game up and down a supersized lineup now that bye weeks have concluded. Is it time to back the Indianapolis Colts on Saturday? Is Atlanta an upset no one sees coming? Listen and find out!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
